meta.article_title: January 20, 2014 - Playing Against the Seemiller or American Grip

terminologie_extrait.definition: a variation of the shakehands grip with the top of the racket rotated to the left
terminologie_extrait.contexte: described as a grip that is sometimes called the American grip, but more commonly called the Seemiller grip

debutant: Play forehand from the backhand over and over to limit their counterloop options
intermediaire: Use deep serves and pushes to the backhand to limit their blocking and hitting options

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice blocking with the Seemiller grip, then immediately loop the ball back to limit their counterloop options.

erreurs_a_eviter: Keep the same motion for both short and long serves
